## Windows Deal

This weekend only, we are offering our Meg (512MB) VPS plan with Windows Server OS included and our Gig (1024MB) VPS plan (Linux Only) for $7.00 each. Just pick your special!

**ZipVPS Meg 512MB - Windows Included** `$7.00 Monthly with coupon code LIW6N5LW2J (automatically applied)`

- 512MB Guaranteed Ram
- 25GB Storage on a Flashcache SSD Cached RAID10/BBU Disk Array
- 500GB Transfer on a Gigabit Port
- 2 Fair Use CPU Cores
- 1 Included IPv4 IP Address
- [Click here to Order](https://cs.holoshed.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=6&promocode=LIW6N5LW2J&utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=post&utm_campaign=letwin72013)

# Want a Linux Weekend Deal? 

**ZipVPS Gig 1024MB** `$7.00 Monthly with coupon code QV1A2H0KI0 (automatically applied)`

- 1024M Guaranteed RAM
- 50GB Storage on a Flashcache SSD Cached RAID10/BBU Disk Array
- 1000GB Transfer on a Gigabit Port
- 4 Fair Use CPU Cores
- 1 Included IPv4 IP Address
- [Click here to Order](https://cs.holoshed.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3&promocode=QV1A2H0KI0&utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=post&utm_campaign=letlin72013)

## Custom Plans/Custom OS/ISO/Templates
- Want to double up on resources (such as make the 1024MB plan a 2048MB plan)? Just do a ticket and we can set something up for you at double the quoted price. (Such as $7.00 x 2 = $14.00)
- If you want a custom template or ISO added, submit a ticket and let us know!
- Other Windows Server OS templates can be made by request but requires extra time. On activation, all Windows Server OS VPS boot to Windows Server 2012. Put Windows Version needed in order notes if different.

## Information
- All VPS located in Buffalo, NY
- 100% satisfaction guranteed - No Questions Asked 3 day refund policy.
- Payment methods accepted are PayPal, Credit Cards and Bitcoins.
- All orders processed generally within 1 to 6 hours.
- We are here to help you where we can even though the service is unmanaged.
- Anything else you wonder about, just ask!
- [Our policies - TOS/Privacy Policy/AUP](http://www.holoshed.com/policies.html)

## LookingGlass: [Network Test](http://ny-test.holoshed.com/)

### Coupon codes valid till 07-22-13 (July 22nd) and apply for the life of the plan.
